branchCategory.name: Manifolds
branchCategory.description: <p>Manifold options for S0700 series.  Available interface include fieldbus and ethernet connectivity, D-sub connectors, flat ribbon cable, PC wiring system compatible, flat ribbon cable, terminal block, lead wire, and circular connectors. </p>

branchItem.name: Slim Compact Bar Base
branchItem.description: <p>Slim compact bar base for S0700 series.  It has 45% smaller footprint compared to Plug-in stacking base.  Available connections:  EX180, EX510 serial transmission system, D-sub and Flat Ribbon Cable.</p>

branchItem.name: Plug-in Stacking Base
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in stacking base mounting for S0700 series.  Available connections: EX600, EX500, EX260, EX250 serial transmission system, D-sub, Flat Ribbon, Terminal Block, Lead Wire, and Circular Connector.</p>

branchItem.name: Plug Lead Type
branchItem.description: <p>S0700 Plug lead manifold base for individual wiring.  Manifold available with body ported valve and base mounted valve.</p>
